head.foreign: Copia obligacionis Jacobi Innes de eodem penes proles quondam Willelmi rolland

div.p:
Be it made kend til all men be thir present lettres me James Innes of that ilk tobe bundin and
oblist be the faith of my body to the aldirman and consel of aberdene as for samekle as
I haf intromettit with five barnys and thare gudis of vmquhile William rolland and
of my spous' margaret of culan the quhilk gudis extendis til ilke knaf barne
to twenty pundis scottis and ilke madyn barne foure score of merkis scottis that
gif ony of the narrest frendis of the said barnys wil ressaue thame within yer'
and day next tocum that I sal deliuer thame and thair gudis be the sicht of the aldir
man and the consel forsaid to thair forsaid frendis gif it plesis thame and gif
thai wil nocht resaf the said barnys and thair gudis / than I oblis' me be the faith
of my body tilsustene and wphald the forsaid barnys in met and claith honest
ly as efferis quhil thai cum to perfit age / and than todeliuer thame thair gudis
til ilkane thair part as said is but fraude or gile / for the quhilkis tobe ful
fullit and done I oblis' me as said is baith my self my landis and gudis moua
bil and vnmouabil my ayris executouris and assignais in stratast stile of
obligacione and band . In witnes heirof I hafe affixt my seil to thir present
lettres at aberdene xj day of marche the yere of god M iiijC lxxiij yeris
before thir witness Androw alanson aldirman of aberdene Johne of marr' maistir
androw liel Richard of Kyntor Johne of Knollis patrik badenagh and Dauid
symson and ser Robert leis notar with vthir sindry

div.p:
The same day the Aldirman and the consel has grauntit and consentit that Dauid colison thar'
conburges salhafe the tak of the towne the landis of Bogfarloch with the pertinence of thaim in like wise as edmond banerman has thame of the now
of siclike price as Edmond banerman has it now in assedacione gif it be likand
to the said Dauid tolowis' fra the said Edmond / and to pay the some' that the la
lyis for eftir as the chartir p And the said Dauy salbe chartirit of the toune in like wise and fourme
as edmond is chartirit and for siclike termys / and this gravnt was made
to the said Dauid theforsaid day be themaist part of the common consel / and the for
saidis aldirman and consel makis him thare assignay in this part and nane vthiris
for to redeme and qwit oute the forsaid landis gif it ples' him as said is

div.head: Impigneracio terraris de Bogfarlach facta Edmundo banerman et cetera
div.p:
Omnibus hoc scriptum visuris uel audituris Burgenses et communitas de burgi de Aberdene salutem in
domini sempiternam Noueritis nos vtilitate nostra in hac parte vndique previsa et diligenter considerata
solempni et frequente tractatu et consilio desuper prehabitis dedisse concessisse et impigner
asse ac in vadium immobile divisisse necnon presenti scripto nostro confirmasse dilecto conburgensi nostro
Edmundo banerman omnes et singulas terras nostras de Bogfarlach cum pertinenciis Jacentes
infra terras nostras communes burgi predicti pro quadam summa centum marcarum vsualis mone
te scocie restantis non solut' de summa centum et quadraginta marcarum impigneracionis terra
rum de ly crois iacencium prope dictum burgum infra vicecomitatum de Aberdene quondam Johannj
de banerman patri dicti edmundi facte et ipsi Edmundo Jure hereditario pertinen' ac
nobis per eundem Edmundum assignate prout in litteris desuper confectis plenius continetur
Tenend' et habend' omnes et singulas predictas terras de Bogfarlach cum
pertinenciis prefato Edmundo et heredibus ac assignatis suis de nobis et succssoribus
nostris per omnes Rectas metas suas antiquas et divisas In moris marresijs viis
semitis et culturis pratis pascuis et pasturis tam in communi quam in proprietate cum curiis
et curiarum exitibus et cum omnibus aliis et singulis libertatibus commoditatibus et aysiamentis ac
iustis pertinenciis quibuscumque ad dictas terras cum pertinenciis spectantibus seu iuste spectare valentibus
quomodolibet in futurum . libere quiete plenarie integre honorifice bene et in pace semper
et quousque nos et successores nostri dicto Edmundo heredibus aut assignatis suis ad
certos duos terminos per equales porciones aut in vno die inter solis ortum et occa
sum eiusdem in ecclesia nostra parrochiali beati Nicholai dicti burgi super magnum altare de
dictis centum marcis dicte monete in prompta pecunia munerata persoluerimus uel persol
uerint plenarie et integre omnibus dolo et fraude remotis firmis vero
fructibus et emolumentis dictarum terrarum cum pertinenciis per dictum Edmundum heredes
et assignatos suos medio tempore qualitercumque leuatis uel leuandis aut perceptis uel
percipiendis in solucione sortis uel alicuius partis eiusdem summe centum marcarum nulla
tenus computandis quia ipsas ipsos et ipsa prefato Edmundo et heredibus ac assignatis
suis pro ipsius Edmundi benemeritis et consiliis nobis impensis concessimus et dedi
mus pro toto tempore quo dicte centum marce fuerint ut premittitur non solute ex do
nacione nostra speciali Insuper si contingat nos vel successores nostros dictas
terras de Bogfarloch redimere ut premittitur viuente dicto Edmundo uel
obimpignerare Volumus et pro nobis et successoribus nostris concedimus quod dictus
Edmundus habebit et possidebit dictas terras cum pertinenciis tanquam in assedacione
nos sibi assedatas pro toto tempore vite sue cum omnibus liberalibus supradictis Sol
uendo inde nobis et successoribus nostris dictus Edmundus pro toto tempore vite
sue quatuor marcas monete supradicte annuatim et proporcionaliter ad duos
annj terminos vsuales penthecostes videlicet et sancti martini in hieme per equales porciones
tantum pro omni alio seruicio seculari exactione demanda que in dictis terris
cum pertinenciis durante vita dicti edmundi aliqualiter exigi poterit aut requiri
Et nos vero burgenses et communitas supradicti totas et integras terras
dictas de Bogfarloch cum pertinenciis prefato Edmundo heredibus et assignatis in
omnibus et per omnia ut predictum est contra omnes morales varantizabimus acquietabimus
et fideliter defendemus De quibus quidem terris cum pertinenciis possessionem dicto
Edmundo per Johannem Kyntor vnum ballivorum nostrorum dicti burgi tradife
cimus corporalem sibi heredibus et assignatis suis vt premittitur remansuram In cuius Rei
testimonium Sigillum nostrum commune dicti burgi presenti scripto nostro est appensum in
pretorio nostro eiusdem burgi quarto die mensis Maij Anno Domini Mmo iiijcmo lixo
testibus nosmet ipsis

The xxvj day of aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij Androw baxtar on the behalf of his wif
is adiugit and ordand be the aldirman and baillies topay til Morice bissat within xv daies

that gif Johne of Ruthirfurd within xv daies next tocum may laghfully prefe that
twenty s' awand til the said morice apon a Ryng was payit til him or his brothir
be the lard of Drum or be ony person on his behalf for the qwitting oute of the
said Ryng than the saidis xiiij s' salbe first allowit be the said Morice for the pay
ment and outredding of the said Ryng

The xxvij day of aprile the yer' forsaid videlicet lxxiiij It is ordand be the aldirman and consel
that thare sal na burges be made for a yer' tocum vthir than beis entrit be Dauid
colison burges of this burgh excep burgess' sonnys / and quhen the yere is gayn
thare salbe na burges made b quhill the said Dauy present ane / and how evyr
the said Dauy makis poyntment with that burges he salhafe him free / for the
Redempcione of a common buke quhilk was layd in wed be Johne of fiffe til
Johne of mar and lowsit be the said Dauy colison et cetera

head.foreign: de Redempcione custume salmonum pro v annis

div.p:
James be the grace of god king of Scottis Til oure custummaris Ressauouris and all
vtheris oure Intromettouris of oure Burgh of Aberdene greting for samekle as
we haue componit with oure louetis Aldirman baillies counsale and communite of our said burgh
and fred thame and ilkane of thaim of all custummis and dewities acht or tobe acht
til ws of the salmondis and fischingis pertening til our said burgh aldirman baillies consel or
communite of the same or til ony ane of thaim for the termes of fyve yeres next tocum
fullely tobe complete fra the date of thir our' lettres And dischargit the
saidis personis of all custummis and dewiteis acht til ws of the said salmond and
fischingis of all tymes bigane before the date of the same Oure wil is
heirfor and we charge you and ilkane of you straitly and commandis that ye
nor ony ane of you compel na distrenye ony of the saidis personis abuf writin for
ony custummys or dewiteis pertening til ws of salmond and fischingis abuf writin
as said is during the tyme forsaid vndir all the hiest pain and charge ye may
commit againnis oure maieste in that part Schaving thir oure lettres to the
lordis Auditouris of oure chekker' for your discharge Gevin vndir oure
priue sele at Edinburgh the viij day of the moneth of Aprile yere of
god M iiijC lxxiiij and of our Regne' the xiiij yere Prouiding all way
that the saidis personis tak na fisching nor salmond belanging othir til Inglis
men or til ony of oure liegis apon thame / bot thare awyn propre gudis
James
And it is to remembre that oure soueran lordis lettre forwritin vndir his prive
seil Is deliuerit in keping til Johne of marr' because that he is custumare
of the gret custume et cetera

The xiij day of maij the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij before the aldirman and baillies in the tolbuthe

twa lele men vnspect with him quhilkis sal swere togiddir with him / that he and thai

add.foreign: concessio facta gilberto morison et David spens de gubernacione terrarum et annuorum reddituum heredum cristini litstar et cetera

div.p:
The third day of June the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij gilbert morison comperit before
the aldirman baillies and certane of the consel and with him Dauy spens / and askit in
the names of thare wiffis quhilkis ar and soulde be nerrest and laghfull ayris
til thare brethir now beand vteu this Realme / brethir to quhilum cristy litstar
that thai mycht hafe the keping and governance of the landis and annuel Rentis perte
ning til quhilum the said cristy except the landis and annualis rentis that the said
cristiys wif has Junctfefment of til the hame cuming of the Richtwis' ayris
And the forsaidis aldirman baillies and consel avisitly has gravntit and
ordand the saidis gilbert and Dauy til intromet with the landis and annuel Rentis
forsaid / and til hafe thame in governance vnto the hamecuming of the rychtwis'
ayris thai makand compt til thealdirman baillies and consel forsaid of the fermyr
proffitis and dewiteis of the said landis and annuel rentis as efferis

The x day of June the yer' et cetera lxxiiij. Anent the clame made be Johne
bartlatson skynnar and marione burnat his wif tilhafe a forbuthe
and the forloft abufe the buthe of Jonet trail modir to the said marion eftir
the tenour of a decret made be certane personis of before / It is decretit
and ordand be the aldirman and consel that the forsaid Johne and his wif sal de
void and red the forbufe and forloft before expremit betuix this day and
sonday cum viij dais next eftir folowand to the vse of the said Jonet trail
fra thyne furth' be hir tobe occupiit brukit and Joysit at hir awne wil
And that the forsaid Johne and his wif has payt all mail and dewiteis of
the said forbuthe and forloft of all termys bygane except the mail of
the last terme of Witsunday bypast quhilk extendis til iiij s' and vj d'

ne et iniusta lesione Elizabeth seruitricis Johannis Vaus seriandi adiudicatur in amerciamento
et emendabit parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

Item eodem die precipitur Duncano straloch vnj seriandorum per ballivos ad premuniendum et summoniendum
Jacobum de Kyntor quod compareat coram eisdem ballivis in pretorio hodie ad quindenam
tanquam in termino peremptorio ad instanciam mathei cowpar responsurus et Juri periturus pro iniusta
detencione vnius barelle salmonum mensure hamburgensis et xxviij s' Cum intimacione et cetera

Item eodem die Breue Inquisicionis margaret crukschank Respectuatur per ballivos cum
consensu parcium videlicet Johannis crukschank et Dauid tailyour statu quo nunc vsque hodie ad
octo absque preiudicio quocumque

The xvii day of June the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij before the aldirman baillies
and consel of this burgh personaly comperand Duncan litstar son' til quhilum Johne
litstar burges of aberdene and til Isabel galt his modir and thare in presence of thaim
be his forspekar Johne of ogstoune of the crag has chosyn and tayn gil
bert morison than beand present tobe his curat vnto the tyme that he cum til
perfite age of xxj yeris withoute ony Reuocacione tobe made be the said Duncan
in tyme tocum / and this the said Duncan has declarit be his aith before
the forsaidis aldirman baillies and consel that he has done and dois it of his avne
free wil vnconstrenyeit be ony maner of person tharto

add.foreign: Reuocacio ex parte Duncani litstar et cetera

div.p:
Alsua it was pronuncit be the said Johne of ogstoune forspekar' til the said Duncan that the
resignacione of the tail of the land liand in the castelgate of this burgh . on the north syde of
the same gate betuix the land of alexander Watson on the eist part and the land of
Johne chapman on the west part made be the said Duncan in the handis of Johne
of Kyntor ane of the baillies of abirdene and the intrusit sesyng gefin tharapon
til Johne of torryleith the xxvj day or aprile the yer' of god M iiijc lxxiiij was
vnordourly done and againnis the cours of common' law and statute of burgh . for the quhilk
caus' the said forspekar in the said Duncanis name before the saidis aldirman bail
lies and common' consel solempnitly Reuokit and gaynsaide the said Resignacion'
and intrusit sesyng . gefin til the said Johne of torryleith / And protestit that it
soulde turne til the said Duncan litstar nor til his ayris til na preiudice in
tyme tocum / and askit at the aldirman and baillies a day tobe prefixt and the
said Johne of torryleith and Isabel his spous' tobe warnit to the said day that
his Reuocacione mycht haf a knaulage . quethir of vail or nocht quhilkis
aldirman and baillies assignit til him the law day eftir mychelmes next tocum
and chargit the offisaris til warne thame tocomper' the said day and
bring with thame sik documentis . as thai walde tyne and wyn / and togif
thare resonis in write til the saidis aldirman and baillies that thai mycht be avi
sit with in the meyntyme

The same day the Aldirman and the maist part of the common consel than beand gadirit thar'
consentit vniuersaly that Gilbert morison sal haue in tak and assedacione ane third
part of a net of the pot wattir of Dee / the quhilk quhilum Cristy litstare
had of before for the termys of the last assedacione et cetera
